meanings.definition: The belief in three separate gods.
meanings.sent1: Some ancient cultures practiced tritheisms, worshipping three different deities.
meanings.sent2: In tritheisms, followers believe in the existence of three distinct gods.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, Sarah's tritheisms of dressing up as Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tritheisms of power, wisdom, and love were said to govern the universe.
meanings.sent5: The concept of tritheisms can be confusing but fascinating when explored deeply.

meanings.definition: The doctrine of the Trinity as three distinct divine persons.
meanings.sent1: The tritheisms of Christianity teach that God is Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
meanings.sent2: In Christian tritheisms, the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit are considered as distinct entities.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actors comically portrayed the tritheisms of the Trinity, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The tritheisms of the Trinity symbolize unity in diversity, like a three-stranded cord.
meanings.sent5: Studying the tritheisms of the Trinity can deepen one's understanding of Christian theology.
